title: The Consultative Hero: Frank Wilson's Week of Resolve

story.text: Frank Wilson discovers his ability to see the potential dangers and opportunities in the future. He decides to use this skill to prevent accidents in his city.
Frank intervenes in a near mishap at a construction site, advising the foreman on a critical flaw in their safety protocol.
Using his insights, Frank mentors a group of troubled teens, steering them away from a future of crime with his compelling foresight.
A local business seeks Frankâ€™s advice. He consults to help them avert a massive financial crisis by adjusting their approach to an upcoming deal.
Frank, now known around the city, helps the police solve a complex case that could have led to a dangerous criminal walking free.
With his growing reputation, Frank holds a free public workshop on personal safety and future planning, attracting a huge crowd.
Reflecting on his week, Frank starts writing a mentorship program curriculum he plans to offer at local schools and online.

ending: In just one week, Frank Wilson transformed his community by merging foresight with action.
moral: Utilizing one's unique talents can lead to significant contributions to society.
